title: The Covington Witches: Part 3
description: Imara Covington has always known that she comes from a family of strong women. Only after an unexpected journey to the quaint town of Edenton, North Carolina, do the family secrets begin to unravel. Once she thought of her family as her safety net and her home as a haven, but now Imara is forced to confront the long buried secrets that are at the center of her family's strength. Part Three of THE COVINGTON WITCHES introduces us to family members who have dirty little secrets they need to keep hidden. But like all secrets, they have a way of worming their way into the light. Find out what Imara Covington has to face in this installment of the horror saga, THE COVINGTON WITCHES, and why family secrets are the most deeply buried secrets of all. There are forces that are willing to sacrifice family member's sanity to keep the truth hidden. Who will suffer and who will succeed?
author: Roz Carter
